Hello I have just joined this wonderful group for several reasons #1 
I am a big fan of Rurouni Kenshin, #2 I am a big fan of Peacemaker 
Kurogane, #3 I am a big fan of Gohatto/Taboo. I also own all 
episodes/DVDs of each series and or movie. I am also interested in 
learning the history behind all the character whether they are in 
anime or not. For example, I am interested in learning more about 
Kawakami Gensai, the person for whom Kenshin Himura of Rurouni 
Kenshin was based upon.
